note:
Hi there! I'm a clown (really, professionally) as well as a dabbler in many forms of repair and creation, (and some computer touching stuff sometimes).
I have ADHD and talk a fair amount about neurodivergence stuff.
I love getting to know people, but if we haven't interacted ( few or infrequent favorites don't really count, I don't get notifications on them, and I don't remember who posted things when I just favorite boosts ), please dm me before following to say hello and let me know why you'd like to follow :D
